snippet.title: Pikmin - Wii Trailer - NEW PLAY CONTROL!
snippet.description:
NEW PLAY CONTROL! - Pikmin
Wii | Nintendo | February 09 (EU) / March (NA)

Pikmin is just one of the NEW PLAY CONTROL! series of games coming soon to Nintendo. Formerly known as the Play on Wii collection, these games bring back some of your GameCube favourites with improved controls and graphics.

This is one of the trailers used to promote the European release of the game. View the Japanese trailer (complete with singing) here: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ydOcFV8nVQc

View the UK advert here: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Qa4lj83_h-o

Click here to see a gameplay video of the game, including instructions on how to play:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jCBxeoni1dM

--
Don't forget to keep checking Wiiloveit.com and WiiloveitTV for your Nintendo gaming goodness
http://www.wiiloveit.com
http://youtube.com/wiiloveittv
--
